tutorial: How to set up a new Chart
type: Adding Charts - Time Machines hold it all together

definition.text: You've seen these portals to another dimention before! Now let's take a closer look at the magical Time Machine.

paragraphs.text: As you can see, each dashboard has a Time Machine attached to it. You have already encountered time machines in previous tutorials. But today we are going to be working with them a lot more closely. Take a minute and read their documentation page to get a better idea of what they do.

The Time Machine is all about synchronizing.  Whether itâ€™s matching up candles with volume indicators or seeing exactly when a buy order was placed by your strategy, the time machine is your best friend in the Charting Space.
One Time Machine in the Design Space will show up as one box, or set of Charts, in the Charting Space
